description:
Generates depth images. Uses planar depth as default setting, perspective depth can be enabled via bUsePerspectiveDepth.
The depth is encoded in millimetres (mm) in the RGB channels of the image. This means the depth value is a 24bit with a maximum value of 16.777216 km. TODO add nanometre option The RGB values can be converted to mm using the following formula: `R + G * 256 + B * 256 * 256`. TODO link python depth convert example

properties.description: Use perspective depth instead of planar depth.
properties.name: bUsePerspectiveDepth
